name: Gallade
description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

abilities.name: Steadfast
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon flinches, its Speed rises one stage.
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.effect: Whenever a dark-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage.  The move is not negated in any way.
abilities.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
